title: Sentinel Pro
description: Manufactured using the latest inverter technologies, the Sentinel Pro is designed to protect critical loads such as servers, data processing IT systems, and telecoms networks.
highlights: Add additional battery packs for extended runtimes
Compact design is ideal for Edge application
Reduce power consumption with ECO and Smart Active modes
Cold Start function enables start-up without mains supply
Intuitive LCD display panel shows UPS status, load, and battery level
Automatically adjusting fan speed keeps noise below 40dBA
5-year warranty provides additional peace of mind

byPass.frequencyTolerance: Frequency selected (from ±1.5 Hz to ±5 Hz configurable)

outputAndInverterOutput.frequency: Selectable: 50 Hz or 60 Hz or self-learning

batteries.type: VRLA AGM maintenance-free lead based; Supercaps

environmental.communication: USB / DB9 with RS232 and contacts / Slot for communications interface
environmental.emcCompliance: EMC 2014/30/EU electromagnetic compatibility; EMC IEC EN 62040-2
environmental.accessoriesProvided: Power cable, IEC-IEC cable, USB cable, safety manual, quick start guide
environmental.standards: European directives: LV 2014/35/EU low voltage; Directive and Standards: RoHS compliant -- Classification in accordance with IEC 62040-3 VFI - SS - 111; UL 1778:2014 and CSA C22.2 No. 107.3-14
